name: OathBound
description:
Dive to the depths of which you know no other, sever the ties that bind you to this wretched place and escape your cruel ancestors and their murderous rage. This game was created by the mentors of Vector Game Studio, a game development club from the GUC, as a submission to Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme "Roots".

A: Move Left

D: Move right

Space Bar: Jump

R: Restart level
